amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Defense to conduct a study and submit a report on the feasibility of conducting a military and civilian partnership health care project.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2573 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2573 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator DeWine. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12791) To require the Secretary of Defense to conduct a study and submit a report on the feasibility of conducting a military and civilian partnership health care project.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2573 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2573 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator DeWine.
